answers.answer: I have28 days to go and Wednesday was put on Labetalol for the rest of my pregnancy.
Yes... I was put on labetalol as well. I was supposed to be delivering my son on October 25 but since my preeclampsia is so bad I'll be induced on Monday at 34 weeks!

question: Any of you ladies on blood pressure meds due to preeclampsia? If so what is the names of the meds?
title: High blood pressure meds
